## PreProcessing Data

### Missing values

```{r }
missing_counts <- colSums(is.na(data))
print(missing_counts)
```
### Looking for Outliers

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x = "", y = GROSS)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Boxplot of Gross Income",
       x = "Gross",
       y = "Dollars")

ggplot(data, aes(x = "", y = Net_Pay)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Boxplot of Net Income",
       x = "Net",
       y = "Dollars")


```
